name: Chet Lere The Baos
description:
If you can´t see the complete Game Window, put your browser in Fullscreen mode by pressing F11!Note: The Web Build hasn´t really been tested yet, so if you encounter any issues please use the Windows Build.

Controls:

  • Jump:  SPACE / A
  • Move:  A +D / LEFT STICK
  • Fall through Platforms:  S / LEFT STICK
  • Pause: ESC / Pause Button.
  • Using a Controller is recommended!

Collect coins to raise your score. The game gets harder the higher your score.

You lose if you get hit three times. Your characters color indicates how many times you have been hit.

Feel free to post your Highscore in the comments!
